Row.Text: Somehow, I knew this was going to happen. I'm not going to lose to you!
If that's what it's come to, then you truly are our enemies. I'll beat you just like you were a Witch!
What...? You're attacking us?! H-hold on, can't we talk about this?
How cruel...you know how much stronger you are than us, and you still want to bully and harass us? I've never hated anyone in my life...and I still don't...but you're making that difficult.
No...don't! Stay back! You may have the advantage in numbers, but...I'll find a way!
You're terrible. Good thing I have nothing to fear from you, though -- and I'll show you why not!
I don't know why you're so eager to fight. But I know me and my girls are stronger than you, so I have no reason to back down!
Hmm, okay then. I've been wondering how well I could shoot a target that could think, so this might actually be a little fun!
If this means that I can put an end to you and your evil, then I'll be happy to.
Don't underestimate the power of hope. Even when the odds look bad, I will never lose that power!
Eh?! Well...this doesn't look good, but it's a chance to prove my worth to my girls! I'll beat you no matter what!
That's weird -- I didn't know you were a Familiar. But, you know, you look even weaker than a Familiar, so this will be over quickly!
Thi--this is too much! Why are you so cruel?! You're even worse than a Witch! Someday, someone is going to beat you like you deserve! Maybe then, the world can find its hope again...

...so, in the end, I really was useless. All I ever wanted was to be useful, to have something I created and could call my own. And now it's all over...urk! My Soul Gem...? Wh-What's hap--ggh, [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]gyaaaaaaaaaaaaaahh[ENDCOLOR]!
Hey there! I hope the two of us can get along well! My name is Madoka Kaname. Pleased to meet you!
Oh, hello! Welcome to Mitakihara -- my name is Madoka, and you may not be able to tell from looking, but I run the place! I hope we can be good friends!
Hey, Leader-chan! I can call you Leader-chan, right? Ehehe!
It's okay, you're not interrupting class! Come on inside!
Oh, hello again!
How are you?
Why did you come here? Just leave, please...
Could...could you just go away, please?
I don't often keep my bow drawn when I talk to people, but I have to make an exception for you.
I may look stupid...but I've fought enough Witches to know when to expect an enemy to go on the offensive. If you must fight me, let's get it over with...
I...I don't appreciate you closing in me and my girls like this by building all those new cities...please stop and give us some room to breathe.
We should sign one of these...um..."open borders treaties"! That way we can go to each others' houses and play!
We should sign one of these...um..."open borders treaties"! That way we can go to each others' houses and play!
I really appreciated sharing this stuff! I'd like to do it some more, if you want to!
I really appreciated sharing this stuff! I'd like to do it some more, if you want to!
I'm really sorry, but I'm not sure if we can keep up this deal. Maybe we can discuss it again...?
I'm really sorry, but I'm not sure if we can keep up this deal. Maybe we can discuss it again...?
As much money as you make, I bet you can afford all of those figures and dolls they make of me![NEWLINE]Ehehe, maybe there's not enough money in the world for that, though...
As much money as you make, I bet you can afford all of those figures and dolls they make of me![NEWLINE]Ehehe, maybe there's not enough money in the world for that, though...
Wow! With all the money you're making, maybe you could spare a little bit so I can buy my pet seal some better food?
Wow! With all the money you're making, maybe you could spare a little bit so I can buy my pet seal some better food?
Your country and its army are so powerful! I hope I can train my army to be just as strong!
Your country and its army are so powerful! I hope I can train my army to be just as strong!
You and your armies have caused more death and destruction than any Witch ever did. Are you here to threaten my girls?
You and your armies have caused more death and destruction than any Witch ever did. Are you here to threaten my girls?
Leader-chan, Leader-chan! I want us to be friends! We'll have lots of fun together. What do you say?
Leader-chan, Leader-chan! I want us to be friends! We'll have lots of fun together. What do you say?
I just talked with the leader of {1_CivName}, and now we're friends too! I hope all of us can get along with each other!
I just talked with the leader of {1_CivName}, and now we're friends too! I hope all of us can get along with each other!
Oh, yay! I heard about your friendship with {1_CivName}! We're already friends with each other! Ehehehe, maybe this means we'll have a trio of good friends now!
Oh, yay! I heard about your friendship with {1_CivName}! We're already friends with each other! Ehehehe, maybe this means we'll have a trio of good friends now!
Would you like to trade embassies? I know it may feel kinda weird for your cabinet to meet with 14 year old girls, but it may help us become friends!
Would you like to trade embassies? I know it may feel kinda weird for your cabinet to meet with 14 year old girls, but it may help us become friends!
Can we have a Magical Girl Embassy set up in your capital? It doubles as a middle school, and I'm sure your citizens can learn a lot there too!
Can we have a Magical Girl Embassy set up in your capital? It doubles as a middle school, and I'm sure your citizens can learn a lot there too!
I found someone snooping around our schools and they were wearing your country's emblem! My girls say it was a spy! How could you?!
I found someone snooping around our schools and they were wearing your country's emblem! My girls say it was a spy! How could you?!
We're gonna beat {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} just like they were a Witch! Isn't that right?
We're gonna beat {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} just like they were a Witch! Isn't that right?
Yay!
Yay!
I'm glad we agreed!
I'm glad we agreed!
Great!
Great!
Yay! You're so nice!
Yay! You're so nice!
You're so generous!
You're so generous!
Ehehe, you're a great friend!
Ehehe, you're a great friend!
Ah, sure! What is it?
Ah, sure! What is it?
I hope you're more honest about your deals than Kyubey! Ehehe, that was a joke...
Oh, yes? What would you like to talk about?
Oh, right! Go ahead!
I'm sorry, but I don't think that's a completely fair deal...just a little bit more could make it work, though!
I'm sorry, but I don't think that's a completely fair deal...just a little bit more could make it work, though!
That's an offer I'd expect out of Kyubey...
That's an offer I'd expect out of Kyubey...
I already like how this deal looks!
I already like how this deal looks!
Umm...how does this sound?
Umm...how does this sound?
Umm...how does this sound?
Umm...how does this sound?
Umm...sorry, but I don't think we can make this trade happen.
Umm...sorry, but I don't think we can make this trade happen.
Thank you so much, Leader-chan!
Thank you so much, Leader-chan!
Thank you so much, Leader-chan!
Yay!
Yay!
Yay!
Awww...that's mean...
Awww...that's mean...
Awww...that's mean...
Those Magical Girls you rescued didn't have the right type of magic to defend themselves. I'm so glad you helped them find their way home! You are one of the nicest people I've ever met!
Those Magical Girls you rescued didn't have the right type of magic to defend themselves. I'm so glad you helped them find their way home! You are one of the nicest people I've ever met!
Those Magical Girls you rescued didn't have the right type of magic to defend themselves. I'm so glad you helped them find their way home! You are one of the nicest people I've ever met!
Those Magical Girls you rescued didn't have the right type of magic to defend themselves. I'm so glad you helped them find their way home! You are one of the nicest people I've ever met!
I may be the embodiment of hope, but sometimes, the hope we need is to defeat those who call themselves our enemies. I'm not about to back down yet.
I may be the embodiment of hope, but sometimes, the hope we need is to defeat those who call themselves our enemies. I'm not about to back down yet.

I can't sit by idly anymore. My friends and the other world leaders need to know that you aren't to be trusted. I hate to do things this way, but I'm going to tell the world how I feel about you![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I can't sit by idly anymore. My friends and the other world leaders need to know that you aren't to be trusted. I hate to do things this way, but I'm going to tell the world how I feel about you![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I can't sit by idly anymore. My friends and the other world leaders need to know that you aren't to be trusted. I hate to do things this way, but I'm going to tell the world how I feel about you![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

Leader-chan, there's something I need to tell you. {1_PlayerName:textkey} is a threat no different from a Witch, and needs to be hunted down. I would prefer if my girls and I had a friend to go into this battle with -- will you help us?

Leader-chan, there's something I need to tell you. {1_PlayerName:textkey} is a threat no different from a Witch, and needs to be hunted down. I would prefer if my girls and I had a friend to go into this battle with -- will you help us?

Leader-chan, there's something I need to tell you. {1_PlayerName:textkey} is a threat no different from a Witch, and needs to be hunted down. I would prefer if my girls and I had a friend to go into this battle with -- will you help us?
You're a doo-doo head!
You're so ugly, I bet even my mom has never been drunk enough to find you attractive!
Hehehe...I bet even Tatsuya-chan could beat up your entire little army by himself.
It must be pretty emasculating to know that a pink little girl is so much more powerful than you![NEWLINE]...and yeah, I DID look up what the word "emasculating" meant just to say that to you.
News has spread of how unhappy your people are with your rule. My story was written by Urobuchi -- your empire doesn't have that excuse for all its suffering.
Ehehe. How's it feel knowing that the Cake Song is a masterpiece compared to your country's awful music?
Sheesh. Just because our country is called Mitakihara doesn't mean we made our whole country entirely one city, like you seemed to!
There's a long way to go before I've finished hunting you down.
There's a long way to go before I've finished hunting you down.
...my girls can't fight anymore. I'm ready to concede...
...my girls can't fight anymore. I'm ready to concede...
...my girls can't fight anymore. I'm ready to concede...
So, how'd you like fighting against the one they call the Arrow of Hope? Now, here's "hope"-ing you're ready to surrender!
So, how'd you like fighting against the one they call the Arrow of Hope? Now, here's "hope"-ing you're ready to surrender!
W-what?! That's too cruel! Why would you say those things to everyone? Fine, then...I'll remember this forever...*sniff*
W-what?! That's too cruel! Why would you say those things to everyone? Fine, then...I'll remember this forever...*sniff*
W-what?! That's too cruel! Why would you say those things to everyone? Fine, then...I'll remember this forever...*sniff*
W-what?! That's too cruel! Why would you say those things to everyone? Fine, then...I'll remember this forever...*sniff*
W-what?! That's too cruel! Why would you say those things to everyone? Fine, then...I'll remember this forever...*sniff*
Umm, I don't think I can really pay you enough for that...
Umm, I don't think I can really pay you enough for that...
Our people are now buying your blue jeans and listening to your pop music.[NEWLINE]...and Mom won't quit talking about how they make her butt look big...
Our people are now buying your blue jeans and listening to your pop music.[NEWLINE]...and Mom won't quit talking about how they make her butt look big...
Our people are now buying your blue jeans and listening to your pop music.[NEWLINE]...and Mom won't quit talking about how they make her butt look big...
Can we quit fighting now? Please?
Isn't it about time we stopped fighting? I know we're both tired of it, right?
So, um...my mom got a little drunk and, uh...stuff happened. Um, can I borrow this from you? I kinda need it to fix things and I'd really, REALLY appreciate it a lot!
So, um...my mom got a little drunk and, uh...stuff happened. Um, can I borrow this from you? I kinda need it to fix things and I'd really, REALLY appreciate it a lot!
Look, you may be a bad guy, but you're one of those bad guys who are just there to be funny and team up with the good guys when the REAL bad guy shows up. You don't scare me.
I hope you didn't plan on trying anything you'll regret. Our bows can take you and your forces out in a minute, tops.
Good luck with your war! Just don't kill civilians, okay?
Leader-chan, I'm so glad to know that you decided to adopt Freedom! That's how everyone should live, without any fear of being silenced or arrested just for disagreeing with people! Right?
Leader-chan, I heard that you have also taken up the path of Order! There's no reason for land, food, water, and all that to be owned by just one person -- it's for everyone!

Ehehe...well, Leader-chan, I somewhat expected you to follow the path of Autocracy, but I'm sure you didn't expect me to. Leading this country has...changed my perspective on some things, and I'm finally putting my new ideas into motion. We'll just leave it at that.
Well...okay. We'll stop.
I'm sorry to say, but I can't just leave someone like you unchecked.
*sniff*...I know what you're here about...*sniff* Trust me, she's been on my mind all day. Can...can we just let this slide, please...?
Um...I can explain...
[COLOR:120:120:120:255](She breaks down in tears, obviously upset over the loss of her intelligence agent, not helped by your refusal to overlook her acts.)[ENDCOLOR]
Thank you...really, thank you...
Mitakihara needs room to expand its borders, and it seems like the only way to do so is through your own! Surrender soon and there won't be much bloodshed!
Mitakihara needs room to expand its borders, and it seems like the only way to do so is through your own! Surrender soon and there won't be much bloodshed!
I can't stand around and ignore it anymore -- you are a threat that needs to be put in check!
I can't stand around and ignore it anymore -- you are a threat that needs to be put in check!
I never thought I'd do something as low as this, but when you lead a country, sometimes the desires of your people matter more than your own. Please forgive me...
I never thought I'd do something as low as this, but when you lead a country, sometimes the desires of your people matter more than your own. Please forgive me...
